In-Depth Insights 🔍

  • AI Agents Need Game Theory, Not Just Goals 🧠
    CMU’s Zico Kolter makes the case for building AIs that cooperate, not just optimize. [Will Knight]

  • 100+ Angel Bets Later, I’m Out 🛑
    “Why I stepped back from angel investing after backing 54 companies and what I'm doing instead.” [Halle Tecco]

  • Tariffs Might Be Killing Your Next VC Round 📉
    Venture deal flow just dropped hard. Blame trade policy, not founders. [Yuliya Chernova]

  • Over 500 applied for Europe’s ‘YC for VC’. Meet the 20 who made the cut 🎓
    New fund, old playbook - Mountside VC leans into accelerators to spot Europe’s early winners. [Amy Lewin]

  • Chips Are the New Arms Race 🔋
    IEEE breaks down who’s really winning the AI hardware wars. Spoiler: it’s not just NVIDIA. [James Myers]

  • How AI Labs Turn Into Startups 🧪
    This article surveys the competitive landscape and suggests some strategies that the labs could pursue to secure good economics for themselves.

Recently Launched Funds 💸

  • Founders Fund $4.6B says the next decacorns are already here - Founders is loading up.

  • Schwarzwald Capital vesta buys into the Schwarzwald thesis: patient capital, big upside.

  • ABC Impact $600M+ aimed at saving the world - climate, health, and inclusion get funded.

  • WND Ventures is ditching the old VC rulebook - founder-first or bust.

  • Precursor Ventures grabs $66M to keep spotting winners before they wear hoodies on panels.

  • ISAI & Capgemini Europe’s B2B game gets a boost - ISAI Cap II is here for SaaS and AI.

  • Symphonic Capital $13.5M to back precision medicine and life sciences that actually move the needle.

  • Eagle Freedom Fund $18M mission fund to fight trafficking - impact VC with teeth.
